group_1.textLeft: I went to Mikoshiba's house, and I found @something...
A computer, which shouldn't be here in this village...
I entered the same number as your safe @combination, and logged in to it.
Then, I found some audio files...

group_1.textRight: ...So what?

group_1.textLeft: Several of the files were at least 2 years old...

group_1.textRight: ...And you listened to them?

group_1.textLeft: Yes... Clearly, with my own ears...

group_1.textRight: I see. I see... So you heard them...

group_1.textLeft: What was that...?! Tell me...!!

group_1.textRight: Ye're better off not knowing.
Ignorance is bliss.

group_1.textLeft: This is not something you can get away with!

group_1.textRight: ...Yes, I should never have allowed people in from outside...
I'll tell ye this. There's no written documentation.
Leaving any would risk other villagers reading @about it.

group_1.textLeft: Mikoshiba...!
Huh...?

group_1.textRight: Ough...

group_1.textLeft: Mikoshiba...?!

group_1.textRight: Granny!

group_1.textLeft: Wait, what's happening...?!

group_1.textRight: Mom!

group_1.textLeft: Girls, leave the room!

group_1.textRight: Granny's dead? Really...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
She had poison tucked into her back tooth.
Perhaps she intended to escape into the @underworld, in the end.

group_1.textRight: She didn't have to do that...

group_1.textLeft: Charu...
That means she admitted them... @Her wrongdoings...

group_1.textRight: But...but... He said that any bad guy can have @another chance...
Mr. Todoroki said so...

group_1.textLeft: It's quite possible that there's some people @who can't...

group_1.textRight: I can't forgive her...
Doing as many awful things as she likes, @and then dying to cover them all up...!
I'm sorry... I shouldn't have brought it up...
I should've gotten more out of Mikoshiba first... @I could've waited...!

group_1.textLeft: Sunao, calm down...
I'd probably have doubled down on her even if you didn't, Sunao...
Because I saw more bodies in the waterfall basin @than could've accumulated within a couple of years.
The Devil had nothing to do with it.
She'd been killing Diviners of her own accord... @The entire time...
...So, Sunao. What did you hear from the @computer...?

group_1.textRight: ...I don't even want to talk about it.

group_1.textLeft: It's something to do with me and Charu, right...?
Let us hear about it...

group_1.textRight: No. You're guaranteed to regret it!

group_1.textLeft: But it's about us, right?
It's not fair of you to take it to your grave.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, Sunao.
We want to know about ourselves. @So let us carry it, too.

group_1.textLeft: What I heard...what I heard was...
The prices of Diviners' lives...
